sentences.sContent: Before that, a "butter-and-egg man" was slang for a visitor with a lot of money, a yokel ready to be separated from his funds.
sentences.sContent_eng: Before that, a "butter-and-egg man" was slang for a visitor with a lot of money, a yokel ready to be separated from his funds.
sentences.sCn: 在那之前，一个“黄油和鸡蛋人”是对有钱拜访者的俚语，一个将要和他的资金分离的庄稼汉。
